Programming is not solving problems, it is executing solutions!!

About

Hi, I'm Rahul, a mobile application developer, living in New Delhi, India. Currently I spend my days working as Lead iOS Developer with IDO Sport Pvt. Ltd


I graduated from Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University where I studied B.Tech (IT) and got a first class degree. While I was at university I interned with GreedyGame Media Pvt. Ltd and SO Infotech Ltd. that helped me to further hone in my skills as a developer. In my last year at the university, I joined IDO Sport Pvt. Ltd as iOS Developer, working alongside completing my graduation. After graduating, I continued working with IDO Sport Pvt. Ltd as Lead iOS Developer.


I’m extremely passionate about app development and design in all it’s forms. When not at work I'm usually working on a new project or learning about new things. Aside from development, I enjoy spending time in reading, watching movies and series & hanging out with friends.

Sportido

Sports Discovery app that lets users play any sport anywhere

Sportido an app that enables participation in Sports and Fitness activities by answering what, where, when, how and whom to play with for any sports & Fitness activities.

Sportido helps you discover and play any sport with like-minded people around you. Connect with other players, explore new sports, participate in events and even find deals on clubs and gyms nearby. With over 700+ sports to choose from; whether popular or rare, adventure or indoor, winter or water, land or sea, dance or combat... you name it, we have it!

Some of my work in Sportido:
• Managed the development of full lifecycle of Sportido mobile application from scratch
• Integrated Social Frameworks like Facebook SDK
• Integrated 3rd Party Frameworks like Fabric, Applozic, Firebase for Push Notifications and Analytics
• Worked on CoreLocation and Google Maps
• Implemented Dynamic Linking to directly send user to any location within the app, even after the installation of the app

    IDO Sport Pvt. Ltd.

    Skills: Swift, RESTful APIs, Xcode, Google Firebase, Facebook SDK, Facebook Graph API, Branch.io, AppsFlyer, Paytm Payment gateway, Dynamic Linking, Fabric SDK, CoreLocation, Google Maps, Apple Push Notifications

Sportido Partner

The app for Sportido Providers

Sportido Partner is a unique platform for different providers ranging from Venue Owners of Ground, Court, Pools etc to Gym owners, Academy Owners, Private Coaches and more who help facilitate any sport.

Sportido Partner app is one shop stop for all of these providers to manage their existing users, new bookings, expiring bookings, pending payments and much more.

    IDO Sport Pvt Ltd

    Skills: Swift, RESTful APIs, Xcode, Google Firebase, AppsFlyer, Fabric SDK, CoreLocation, Google Maps, Apple Push Notifications

iBeacon for Sensoro

A Beacon Explorer app for Sensoro

iBeacon is an iPhone based app that allows users to register beacon hardware with the app and conveniently view and interact with the listed beacons within range. This project is based on beacons provided by Sensoro.

Some of the features of the app are
• notify when a new beacon is entered and when listed beacon exit
• list metrics like temperature, light intensity, etc on the iPhone
• shows if beacon is in motion or not
• monitors proximity of the beacons in range

    Skills: Swift, Sensoro SDK, Xcode, Apple Push Notifications

ChitChat

Messenger which works on P2P Network

An iPhone based application, which uses Multipeer Connectivity Framework, enables you to chat with people around you – even if there is no Internet connection or mobile phone coverage. Connected peers are able securely transmit messages, streams, or file resources to other devices without going through an intermediary web service.

    Skills: iOS, Objective-C, XCode, Multipeer Connectivity Framework

DailyRun GPS

Easy to track path, measure distance and burnt calories

A very easy to use application specially designed for Windows Phone 8 which tracks the path and measures the running distance, as well as calories burned during this time. It measures the distance using phone's inbuilt GPS receiver.

    Skills: Windows Mobile, Windows Phone Sdk, Bing Maps

Contacts List

Contacts List Manager and Editer

An android based application which manages the contacts and perform operations like adding a contact, deleting a contact, attaching email id and many more.

    Skills: Android, Eclipse IDE, Android SDK

Sunrise Radio FM

Sports Discovery app that lets users play any sport anywhere

One of the most popular radio station is now available on iPhone and iPad, playing a variety of music from Bollywood to Ghazals, Asian Pop to Bhangra and more.

• Listen to Sunrise Radio on your iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch
• See a live stream of what you hear on-air, including songs, news, weather, travel and much more
• Browse photo galleries and events
• Interact with Sunrise Radio and call, email, text and Tweet, all directly from within the app

    Software Intern @ SO Infotch Pvt. Ltd.

    Skills: iOS, Objective-C, UIKit, Cocoa Touch, Xcode

Temperature Converter

An Android based application which converts the temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius and vice-versa.

    Skills: Android, Eclipse IDE, Android SDK

IP Lookup

An iPhone based application which list all the details like country, region, longitude, latitude of a specified IP address.

    Skills: Objective-C, RESTful APIs, Xcode

Zip Locator

Retrieve all info of supplied Pin Code and show it on Map

An iPhone based application which gives all the information of the supplied Postal Code and display the location on Map.

    Skills: Objective-C, RESTful APIs, Xcode, CoreLocation, Maps
